Package: com.github.dfrommi.pandoc.types

[Groovy] Class Table

    • com.github.dfrommi.pandoc.types.Table
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      Block

      @Pandoc
class Table
extends java.lang.Object

      Table structure.

      Example:
      Right   Left     Center     Default
 -------   ------ ----------   -------
    12   12        12            12
   123   123       123          123
     1   1          1             1

 Table: Caption
